    • Method Detail

      • checkMove

        public static boolean checkMove​(int[] move,
                                int[][] board)
        Checks if a move is valid for the board.
        Parameters:
        move - Proposed move (supposed in {r,c,v} format)
        board - The board
        Returns:
        true if the move is valid, false otherwise.

      • neighbours

        public static java.util.ArrayList<int[]> neighbours​(int r,
                                                    int c,
                                                    int rows,
                                                    int cols)
        Returns the neighbours of a given cell in a given board size.
        Parameters:
        r - the row coordinate of the cell
        c - the column coordinate of the cell
        rows - the number of rows in the board
        cols - the number of columns in the board
        Returns:
        An arraylist of row-column coordinates of this cell's neighbours.

      • hasMove

        public static boolean hasMove​(int[][] board)
        Determine if a move exists on the board
        Parameters:
        board - the board
        Returns:
        true if there is a move, false if there isn't.
